title: GENERAL
fullText:
Electrical equipment containing liquid dielectrics shall be installed in accordance with the following requirements:
(a)	The equipment shall be installed in a location where any leakage of liquid dielectric will not create a hazard.
(b)	Where the equipment contains more than 100 L of liquid dielectric, provision shall be made to prevent the spread of any leakage byâ€”
	(i)	installing the equipment in a room or enclosure having a liquid-tight floor or sill; or
	(ii)	providing a catchpit or similar means of containment.
(c)	Where the equipment contains more than 2500 L of liquid dielectric, provision shall be made for the collection and disposal of any liquid dielectric that may leak from the equipment.
